snippet.title: Of Life and Land | Steam Early Access Announcement Trailer 2024
snippet.description:
Of Life and Land is set to launch into Steam Early Access on April 2nd ($24.99) for PC and Linux.

Of Life and Land is a charming settlement-building strategy game paired with a rich simulation experience. Every animal and plant tries to find their place in nature while you lead your villagers to their future. Expand to different regions and trade with local factions to gain needed resources.

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1733110?utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=ReleaseDateAnnouncementTrailer
Press Kit: https://www.kerzoven.com/presskit/docs/index.html
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@kerzoven 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/kerzoven
